## Divider Rounder

##### Lawrence / Werner TWS Series

* * *

#### Application

The TWS is a fully automatic divider/rounder which can be used in semi and
fully automatic lines. The TWS can handle a wide variety of dough, from very
stiff to soft, due to its unique design. This divider/rounder uses absolutely
no oil. The Werner Pfleiderer Tewimat TWS is made in Germany.

* * *

#### Capacity

  * Up to 55 strokes/minute, depending on dough weight (minimum capacity: 20 strokes/minute)
  * Units can be supplied with 3 to 10 and even 12 pocket heads

#### Features

  * Lawrence Single Rounder/Belt pneumatically tensioned
  * Hopper fed design with 135lbs capacity
  * Hydraulically adjustable pressure regulator
  * Individual measuring pistons can be blocked easily
  * A.C. inverter drive system
  * Ease of access aids for cleaning and change over to various weight ranges

#### Options

  * New stainless steel dough bed with brass mating parts (must be run with divider oiler)
  * Piston in a piston, Piston in sleeve, Custom elliptical pistons
  * 22-point Lawrence oiling system
  * Rounding drum dryer aid in dough balls organized release from the drum.
  * Continuous Rounding Transmission – assures organized discharge of smaller dough balls at high cycle rates
  * A.C. Inverter drive system on Rounding Section
  * Ball control roller
  * Rear cleaning brush with removable crumb drawer
  * Flour duster

### AUTOMATIC DOUGH FEEDER

#### Application

  * Used to automate the dough feeding of high speed Dividers. The unit functions as a proof and surge hopper to consistently feed the dough divider, assuring uniform weights.

#### Capacity

  * Hopper capacity 600 to 1,000 lbs. (dough weight)

#### Construction

  * Stainless steel hopper
  * Stainless steel frame

#### Critical Control Point Monitors

  * Timer delay for precise level control

#### Features

  * Track mounted hopper for ease of service
  * Proximity paddle position sensor
  * Hopper out of position safety circuit
  * U.L. approved electrical control panel
  * A.C. gear motor actuation with brake
  * Easy to clean design
  * Requires no air supply

#### Options

  * CE or CSA Conforming
  * Watertight electrical enclosures
  * 1000 lbs. hopper capacity (dough weight)
